data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Nice.
Lyon's Bruno Guimaraes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Antony Gautier awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Lyon have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In Nice Lyon drive forward through Memphis Depay. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Nice.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice.
Antony Gautier signals a Nice throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 16, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Nice's Rony Lopes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Houssem Aouar of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Alexis Claude-Maurice of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 24, Antony Gautier awards Lyon a goal kick.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Nice.
In Nice Lyon attack through Memphis Depay. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 28, Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Lyon have been awarded a penalty in Nice...
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
Goal! Lyon take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Memphis Depay spot-kick..
In the minute 33, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Nice have a goal kick.
Lyon's Bruno Guimaraes gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Antony Gautier signals a Lyon throw-in in Nice's half.
In the minute 39, Lyon take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Tino Kadewere.
Amine Gouiri keeps Niceâ€™s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 1-2.
Rony Lopes instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, Free kick Nice.
The first-half is over.
Antony Gautier has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Nice.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Lyon at Allianz Rivera.
Lyon needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Lucas Paqueta for Lyon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Antony Gautier awards Lyon a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Nice.
In the minute 57, Kephren Thuram Ulien (Nice) has received a yellow card from Antony Gautier.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Corner awarded to Nice.
In the minute 59, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Nice's area.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Nice.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dan Ndoye is replacing Alexis Claude-Maurice for the home team.
In the minute 62, Nice make their first substitution with Youcef Atal replacing Hassane Kamara.
Great finish from Karl Toko Ekambi to give Lyon a 1-3 lead.
Tino Kadewere with an assist there.
In the minute 66, Nice are in shooting range from this free kick.
Maxwel Cornet for Lyon has been booked by Antony Gautier and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Lyon.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nice.
Dan Ndoye (Nice) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi has run offside.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Lyon.
It's now 1-4 in Nice as Houssem Aouar scores for Lyon.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Rony Lopes with Alexis Trouillet. This is the third substitution made today by Adrian Ursea.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 76, In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nice have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Mattia De Sciglio is on a sub for Maxwel Cornet for Lyon.
The away team replace Tino Kadewere with Moussa Dembele.
In the minute 80, Nice to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
The away team replace Jason Denayer with Djamel Benlamri.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Lyon pushes forward through Lucas Paqueta, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Nice.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Lyon make their fourth substitution with Jean Lucas replacing Houssem Aouar.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a fifth substitution, with Rayan Cherki replacing Memphis Depay.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Nice advance rapidly upfield but Antony Gautier blows for offside.
Lyon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nice.
Nice's Jordan Lotomba breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Antony Gautier awards Lyon a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Paqueta for Lyon drives towards goal at Allianz Rivera. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Nice. The final score is 1-4.
